nodes.text: Philology was a roleplaying-game adventure in year two of the Living Force campaign. It was the third scenario in the Below the Belt trilogy and was written by Morrie Mullins and Christina Nichols.

After his second-in-command, Len Markus, goes missing in the Cularin system asteroid belt, the crime lord Nirama sends the heroes to find him. However, Markus has an agenda of his own and steals an ancient Sith artifact known as the Darkstaff. This causes the Almas Sith fortress to lash out at it with a huge beam of Force lightning, which causes the Cularin system to disappear for ten years and then reappear during the Clone Wars, with it seeming to the people there as if no time has passed at all.
